title: Datte... Gaman Dekinai (>\_<)
original_name: だって… 我慢できないっ（>\_<）
sinopse:
Misaki Ogawa can't help getting hit on by all the boys in her school because of her mature-looking appearance. But she's always been in love with her hero, her childhood friend, the short but strong Issei who's always protected her.

Included one-shots:
Yumemigachi Honey
Suki tte Ienai Ryouomoi.
